thread.title: BRIEF-Bottomline Technologies Reports Q2 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.08

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bottomline Technologies Reports Q2 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.08
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Bottomline Technologies (De) Inc:
* BOTTOMLINE TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS SECOND QUARTER RESULTS * Q2 CORE EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.31 * Q2 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.08 * Q2 REVENUE ROSE 10 PERCENT TO $95.2 MILLION * BOTTOMLINE TECHNOLOGIES - SUBSCRIPTION AND TRANSACTION REVENUE, WHICH ARE PRIMARILY RELATED TO COMPANYâ€˜S CLOUD PLATFORMS, WERE $63.2 MILLION FOR Q2, UP 14%
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.26, REVENUE VIEW $92.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
